p: As shown in Supplementary Figure S14, children younger than 20 years were proportionately over-represented among both unvaccinated and vaccinated 3C.3a cases compared with 3C.2a1b cases or controls. Conversely, adults 35–54-years-old were under-represented among unvaccinated 3C.3a cases compared with unvaccinated 3C.2a1b cases or controls (7/74 (9%) vs 22/128 (17%) or 327/1,136 (29%)) but were over-represented among vaccinated counterparts (14/36 (39%) vs 12/56 (21%) or 140/525 (27%)).
